channel.title: [508] Three Small Errors [508]

item.title: [508] Three Small Errors [508]
item.dc:creator: @I_Hawk_I I Hawk I
item.description:
@I_Hawk_I wrote:

[code].\Bulby\players\Player.java:16: package Bulby.players.ptrade does not exist
import Bulby.players.ptrade.PTrade;
^
.\Bulby\players\Player.java:1179: cannot find symbol
symbol : class PTrade
location: class Bulby.players.Player
public PTrade pTrade;
^
.\Bulby\players\Player.java:2243: cannot find symbol
symbol : class PTrade
location: class Bulby.players.Player
pTrade = new PTrade(this);
^
3 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

[/code]

This might be a lot easier to fix than I make it out to be.

I was just adding trading to the server I’m working on, which is using Bulby’s base.

What I make from the code is that it can’t find the following

package Bulby.players.ptrade does not exist

and

public PTrade pTrade;

but, here as you can see, I clearly have the correct package and files in the correct places…

and this is the code at the top of my PTrade.JAVA file:

[code]package Bulby.players.ptrade;

import Bulby.players.items.*;
import java.util.LinkedList;
import Bulby.Engine;
import Bulby.players.Player;
[/code]

and the one from my player.JAVA:

[code]package Bulby.players;

import java.net.Socket;
import Bulby.Engine;
import Bulby.io.Frames;
import Bulby.net.PlayerSocket;
import Bulby.util.Stream;
import Bulby.util.Misc;
import Bulby.npcs.NPC;
import Bulby.npcs.loading.LoadNPCLists;
import Bulby.players.items.PlayerWeapon;
import Bulby.players.combat.PlayerCombat;
import Bulby.players.ptrade.PTrade;
import Bulby.io.packets.Prayer;
import Bulby.io.packets.NPCOption1;
import Bulby.Skills.;
import java.util.;
import java.lang.;
import Bulby.content.;
[/code]

I can’t really see what is wrong, I have tried time and time again to see if I can resolve the problem but no luck.

I would appreciate it if someone gave me a little bit of a nudge in the right direction, as I’m fairly new to 508’s.

If you require any more information to help with solving this issue, feel free to ask and I will give it.

-Hawk
